text:
AWS customers need to deliver analytics
services to their end customers 24/7.

Having a resilient cloud-database warehouse
infrastructure is mission critical.

The new Amazon Redshift Multi-AZ
configuration delivers high availability

and reliability to support
business-critical analytics workloads.

Amazon Redshift is a cloud-based data
warehouse that supports many recovery capabilities,

such as automatic backups
used to recover a data warehouse,

automated remediation of failures,
and the ability to relocate a cluster to another availability zone
without changes to applications.

With Amazon Redshift Multi-AZ deployment,
you can run a Redshift data warehouse

in multiple AWS Availability Zones
simultaneously and continue to operate
during unforeseen failure scenarios.

No application changes are required
to maintain business continuity

since the Multi-AZ data deployment is still managed as a
single data warehouse with one end point.
How does this benefit AWS customers?

Amazon Redshift Multi-AZ reduces
recovery time by guaranteeing capacity

to automatically recover
during AZ failures.

Amazon Redshift Multi-AZ
deployments are intended for customers

with business critical
analytics applications that require

the highest levels of availability
and resiliency to unforeseen outages.

Get started with Amazon
Redshift Multi-AZ today.
